locations.title: Salvation Army - Billings
locations.description:
The Salvation Army was founded in London in 1865. Since then it has grown into a global charitable organization, currently serving in 130 countries.

Financial donations are more than welcome, but they also accept goods such as clothing, houseware, home appliances, furniture, and others. If you're not sure whether they can accept your donation, please give them a call beforehand.
locations.address: 2910 S 30th St W, Billings, MT 59102, USA

locations.title: Dress for Success - Billings
locations.description:
Dress for Success is a global nonprofit organization dedicated to empowering women to achieve economic independence by providing them with professional attire, support, and development tools. Donations of gently used professional clothing are collected and distributed to women seeking to enter or reenter the workforce. These donated clothes are carefully selected to help clients present themselves confidently during job interviews and in the workplace, reflecting professionalism and competence.

In addition to offering business attire, Dress for Success provides career development programs, mentoring, and networking opportunities. The organization’s goal is to address both the immediate need for proper work attire and the long-term success of women by equipping them with the skills and confidence necessary to thrive in their careers. By offering clothing donations alongside holistic career support, Dress for Success helps women gain financial independence and empowers them to break free from cycles of poverty.

locations.title: Goodwill - Belgrage
locations.description:
Goodwill is a non-profit organization that initiates community-based programs related to gainful employment. It was founded in 1902 in Boston.

The accept financial donations, as well as clothing and household items in usable condition. If you're not sure whether they can accept your donation, please give them a call beforehand.

locations.title: YWCA Montana - Missoula
locations.description:
Since the 1850s, the Young Women’s Christian Association (YWCA) USA has been advocating for the empowerment, leadership, and rights of women and girls in the United States.

To help fund their causes, they welcome financial donations, and some other items. If you're not sure whether they can accept your donation, please give them a call beforehand.
locations.address: 1136 W Broadway St, Missoula, MT 59802, USA

locations.title: St Vincent De Paul - Billings
locations.description:
St Vincent de Paul offers material and spiritual aid to households and individuals in need. Its outreach activities extend to disaster relief, as well as visits to elder care facilities, hospitals, and prisons.

Donations accepted include clothing, shoes, non-perishable food, houseware, toys, school supplies, and more. If you're not sure whether they can accept your donation, please give them a call beforehand.
